snippet.title: Sultan's Game | Story Trailer
snippet.description:
The Sultan forces you, his minister, to participate in a cruel game: draw one of four cards and complete its challenge within seven days – or you will be executed.

Will you play along or will you plot to overthrow the tyrant?
Demo available now: https://store.steampowered.com/app/3117820/
